target.name: Record to FLV
target.command: ffmpeg -f image2 -i ~/ScreenStudio/overlay.png -f x11grab -framerate 10 -show_region 1 -video_size @INWIDTHx@INHEIGHT -i :0.0+@INX,@INY -filter_complex [1:0][0:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i default -r 10 -s 720x480 -ar 44100 -vb 9000k -ab 128k -strict experimental -y -vcodec libx264 -preset ultrafast -acodec aac -bufsize 2000k -g 2 -y ~/ScreenStudio/capture.mp4

services.author: Patrick Balleux

commands.command: avconv -f video4linux2 -itsoffset @WEBCAMOFFSET -video_size @WEBCAMWx@WEBCAMH -i @WEBCAMDEV -f image2 -i @BANNERSRC -filter_complex [0:0][1:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i @PULSEDEV -r @OUTFPS -s @OUTWx@OUTH -ar @OUTAUDIORATE -vb @OUTVIDEORATEk -ab @OUTAUDIOBITRATEk -strict experimental -y -vcodec @VIDEOCODEC -preset @PRESET -acodec @AUDIOCODEC -bufsize @BUFFERSIZEk -g @GROUP -f @MUXER @OUTSINK

avconv -f video4linux2 -itsoffset @WEBCAMOFFSET -video_size @WEBCAMWx@WEBCAMH -i @WEBCAMDEV -f image2 -i @BANNERSRC -f x11grab -framerate @DESKTOPFPS -show_region 1 -video_size @DESKTOPWx@DESKTOPH -i :0.0+@DESKTOPX,@DESKTOPY -filter_complex [2:0][0:0]overlay=@WEBCAMLAYOUT[out];[out][1:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i @PULSEDEV -r @OUTFPS -s @OUTWx@OUTH -ar @OUTAUDIORATE -vb @OUTVIDEORATEk -ab @OUTAUDIOBITRATEk -strict experimental -y -vcodec @VIDEOCODEC -preset @PRESET -acodec @AUDIOCODEC -bufsize @BUFFERSIZEk -g @GROUP -f @MUXER @OUTSINK

avconv -f image2 -i @BANNERSRC -f x11grab -framerate @DESKTOPFPS -show_region 1 -video_size @DESKTOPWx@DESKTOPH -i :0.0+@DESKTOPX,@DESKTOPY -filter_complex [1:0][0:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i @PULSEDEV -r @OUTFPS -s @OUTWx@OUTH -ar @OUTAUDIORATE -vb @OUTVIDEORATEk -ab @OUTAUDIOBITRATEk -strict experimental -y -vcodec @VIDEOCODEC -preset @PRESET -acodec @AUDIOCODEC -bufsize @BUFFERSIZEk -g @GROUP -f @MUXER @OUTSINK

avconv -f image2 -i @BANNERSRC -framerate @DESKTOPFPS -i @REMOTEURL -filter_complex [1:0][0:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i @PULSEDEV -r @OUTFPS -s @OUTWx@OUTH -ar @OUTAUDIORATE -vb @OUTVIDEORATEk -ab @OUTAUDIOBITRATEk -strict experimental -y -vcodec @VIDEOCODEC -preset @PRESET -acodec @AUDIOCODEC -bufsize @BUFFERSIZEk -g @GROUP -f @MUXER @OUTSINK

avconv -f video4linux2 -itsoffset @WEBCAMOFFSET -video_size @WEBCAMWx@WEBCAMH -i @WEBCAMDEV -f image2 -i @BANNERSRC -framerate @DESKTOPFPS -i @REMOTEURL -filter_complex [2:0][0:0]overlay=@WEBCAMLAYOUT[out];[out][1:0]overlay=0:0 -f pulse -i @PULSEDEV -r @OUTFPS -s @OUTWx@OUTH -ar @OUTAUDIORATE -vb @OUTVIDEORATEk -ab @OUTAUDIOBITRATEk -strict experimental -y -vcodec @VIDEOCODEC -preset @PRESET -acodec @AUDIOCODEC -bufsize @BUFFERSIZEk -g @GROUP -f @MUXER @OUTSINK
